message: An F-35 plane landing vertically on the Burj Al Arab Hotel in Dubai.
event_breakdown: 1. An F-35 plane landing vertically on the Burj Al Arab Hotel in Dubai.

message: Paris: French security forces break into Sciences Po the Institute of Political Science to break up an anti-Israel demonstration by the students there.
event_breakdown: 1. French security forces break into Sciences Po Institute of Political Science in Paris to disperse an anti-Israel demonstration by students.

message:
About 100,000 Palestinians have left the Gaza Strip since the beginning of the war

The Palestinian ambassador in Egypt: since the beginning of the war and until April, 85 thousand Palestinians left the Gaza Strip for Egypt through the Rafah crossing.

Taking the month of April into account, it can be estimated that about one hundred thousand Palestinians left the Strip since the beginning of the war.
event_breakdown:
- About 100,000 Palestinians have left the Gaza Strip since the beginning of the war.
- The Palestinian ambassador in Egypt reported that 85 thousand Palestinians left the Gaza Strip for Egypt through the Rafah crossing from the beginning of the war until April.
- If we consider the month of April, it is estimated that about one hundred thousand Palestinians have left the Strip since the war started.

message:
Fox News: The Iranian flag was raised by the students at the University of Irvine in California.

Iran is offering scholarships to students who will be expelled from US universities following the protests.
event_breakdown:
1. Iranian flag raised by students at the University of Irvine in California, as reported by Fox News.
2. Iran announces scholarships for students facing expulsion from US universities due to protests.

message:
The Shia militias in Iraq claim:
Yesterday afternoon (May 2nd) we launched two cruise missiles from Iraq at a target in Tel Aviv and at a target in Be'er Sheva.

The militias in Iraq also claim that they attacked an Israeli target in the Dead Sea early this morning "with appropriate weapons".

###
Sources of the Lebanese al-Mayadeen claim that the Iraqi cruise missiles were launched at the Glilot Base in Tel Aviv and the Avraham Base in Be'er Sheva.
event_breakdown:
- Shia militias in Iraq claim to have launched two cruise missiles from Iraq at a target in Tel Aviv and a target in Be'er Sheva
- Shia militias in Iraq claim to have attacked an Israeli target in the Dead Sea early in the morning

message:
The coup in Niger: Russian soldiers reportedly enter a military base where the American troops are stationed

According to Reuters, Russian soldiers have entered a military air base housing American forces in the capital of Niger.

As you might remember, last year there was a coup in Niger and the military junta that seized power demanded that the US terminate the agreement with it and... remove all American forces from Niger.

The American forces have not yet evacuated and now they have new "guests" at their base.

American officials state that the Russian and American soldiers remain in separate areas at the base. The American Secretary of Defense spoke out on the matter and said that there is no fear that the Russians will get their hands on American equipment.

##
The Taliban send their regards..
event_breakdown:
1. Russian soldiers reportedly enter a military base housing American forces in Niger's capital
2. The military junta in Niger demands the US to remove all American forces following a coup
3. American officials confirm Russian soldiers on the base but state they remain in separate areas
4. American Secretary of Defense addresses the situation, assuring no risk to American equipment

message:
Last night's attack in Damascus, attributed to Israel

Syrian sources identified with the Shiite axis report that the target of the Israeli attack in Damascus was the "State Security School" (of the Syrian Army - AA), near the village of Najaha, and as a result, a three-story building was severely damaged there.
According to these sources, the target of the attack belonged to the Syrian army and not to Iranian elements in Syria.

The Syrian Ministry of Defense officially announced that Israel carried out an airstrike last night at 10:05 PM which resulted in the injury of 8 Syrian soldiers and damage to property.
event_breakdown:
- Last night's attack in Damascus, attributed to Israel
- Target of the attack was the "State Security School" near the village of Najaha
- A three-story building was severely damaged as a result of the attack
- The target of the attack belonged to the Syrian army and not to Iranian elements in Syria
- Israeli airstrike carried out at 10:05 PM, resulting in the injury of 8 Syrian soldiers and damage to property

message:
After the report of the Bloomberg agency's reporter in Turkey 👆, the Turkish Ministry of Commerce officially announces:

From today, the import of goods from Israel and the export of goods to it will be suspended until all aid can be brought into the Gaza Strip
event_breakdown: - Turkish Ministry of Commerce announces suspension of import and export of goods with Israel

message: Palestinian sources report the death of officer Muhammad Adas, one of the companions of Palestinian Authority Chairman Abu Mazen from the Presidential Guard, as a result of an IDF shot that hit him in the head during the entry of IDF forces into the village of Anbata in the Tulkarm district in the last hour.
event_breakdown:
1. Palestinian officer Muhammad Adas, a companion of Palestinian Authority Chairman Abu Mazen from the Presidential Guard, reportedly killed by an IDF shot to the head.
2. Incident occurs during the entry of IDF forces into the village of Anbata in the Tulkarm district, according to Palestinian sources.

message:
Sources associated with the Syrian opposition report on limited explosions heard in the last half hour in Damascus, the capital of Syria.

According to these sources, the Syrian air defense systems were not activated.

The sources add that an Israeli airstrike was carried out against a military post near the fifth bridge on the road leading to the Damascus border.
event_breakdown:
- Limited explosions heard in Damascus
- Syrian air defense systems not activated
- Israeli airstrike against a military post near the fifth bridge on the road leading to the Damascus border

message:
Following today's report on the death of Dr. Adnan Albarsh 👆 and another Gazan, in prison in Israel, Hamas, in an official announcement on its behalf, is trying to create symmetry with the Israeli abductees in Gaza and states that "the death of two of our people abducted in the prison of the fascist occupation, under barbaric torture is proof of the heinous war crimes committed by the occupation.. "
Hamas calls on the international community to act immediately and condemn "this Nazi behavior and force Israel to reveal what happened to the thousands of Palestinians kidnapped by Israel and to return them to their families..."
event_breakdown:
- Death of Dr. Adnan Albarsh in an Israeli prison
- Death of another Gazan in an Israeli prison
- Hamas accusing Israel of war crimes and torture of prisoners
- Hamas calling on the international community to condemn Israel's actions and demand the release of Palestinian prisoners

message: Palestinian channels: Settlers threw stones at Palestinian vehicles on Route 60
event_breakdown: Settlers throw stones at Palestinian vehicles on Route 60, as reported by Palestinian channels.

message:
A new organization calling itself the "Ashtar Brigades" - the Islamic resistance in Bahrain, claims to have launched a drone at the "Traknet" company, which deals with vessel traffic, in Eilat.

This is the first time that an organization related to the axis of resistance located in Bahrain accepts responsibility for military action against Israel.

##
Bahrain is signed on the Abraham Accords security agreement with Israel.
event_breakdown:
- The Ashtar Brigades claim responsibility for launching a drone at the Traknet company in Eilat, Israel, from Bahrain. 
- This is the first military action by an organization related to the axis of resistance in Bahrain against Israel.
- Bahrain is signed on the Abraham Accords security agreement with Israel.

message:
IDF spokesperson:

Earlier today, IDF forces cleared the remains of another surface-to-surface missile that was intercepted in the Nahal Yalim area, near Arad, as part of the Iranian attack that took place last month.

Hazardous materials were cleared out and the evacuation was carried out using a crane (Rio 6x6) by IDF forces, led by the South District of the Home Front Command and together with fire and rescue forces.

The public is requested to act in accordance with the instructions of the Home Front Command when encountering a suspicious object. It is important to emphasize that falls and fragments of interceptions and missles may be dangerous.
Don't touch them, stay away and report finding them to the police hotline 100.
event_breakdown:
- IDF forces cleared remains of a surface-to-surface missile near Arad, in the Nahal Yalim area
- Evacuation and hazardous materials clearance conducted using a crane by IDF forces in collaboration with fire and rescue teams
- Public urged to follow Home Front Command instructions when encountering suspicious objects due to potential danger from falls and fragments of missiles.

message:
The Palestinian Prisoner's Club:
Dr. Adnan Albarash, head of the Orthopedics Department at Shifa Hospital in Gaza City, who was arrested by IDF forces who raided the hospital compound, died in an Israeli prison.
event_breakdown:

2. Albarash was arrested by IDF forces during a raid on the hospital compound, according to the Palestinian Prisoner's Club.

message:
Anti-Israeli, Hamas-supporting students at CUNY drag the American flag across the floor while stepping on it.

For Muslims, the sole of the shoe is considered impure (this is why they take off their shoes and wash their feet before entering a mosque). For them, stepping on the flag symbolizes the highest possible level of contempt towards the flag and what it represents.

message:
Tulkarm, West Bank: Palestinian media reports that the last night Palestinian Authority's Security Services killed Ahmed Abu Al-Ful, the commander of the "death squads" in the military wing of the Islamic Jihad in Tulkarm.

Hamas and the Islamic Jihad issued proclamations in which they strongly condemned the PA.
Local organizations in Tulkarm called for demonstrations against the Palestinian Authority.

The spokesman for the PA's Security Services presented the its version of the events:

Abu Al-Ful fired at a PA patrol and they returned fire at the source of the shooting.
event_breakdown:
- Ahmed Abu Al-Ful killed by Palestinian Authority's Security Services in Tulkarm
- Hamas and Islamic Jihad condemn the Palestinian Authority
- Local organizations in Tulkarm call for demonstrations against the PA
- PA's Security Services claim Abu Al-Ful fired at them first, leading to exchange of fire

message:
The President of Colombia, Gustavo Petro, announced today during a speech in De Bolivar Square, on the occasion of Workers' Day, that starting tomorrow Colombia will sever diplomatic ties with Israel due to the war in Gaza.

##
The Colombian military industry will be less than happy with the announcement...
event_breakdown:
1. President of Colombia, Gustavo Petro, announces Colombia will sever diplomatic ties with Israel due to the war in Gaza during a speech in De Bolivar Square on Workers' Day.
2. Colombian military industry likely to be unhappy with the announcement.

message:
Following the report yesterday 👆

IDF: For the first time since the beginning of the war: The Erez Crossing has been opened for the entry of humanitarian aid

According to the government directive, and as part of the effort to increase the quantity and routes for humanitarian aid to the Gaza Strip, for the first time since the beginning of the war, the IDF, through the Coordination of Government Activities in the Territories (COGAT), opened the Erez Crossing of the Ministry of Defense's Land Crossings Authority today (Wednesday), to allow the entry of humanitarian aid into the Gaza Strip. As part of this effort, after careful security inspection, 30 trucks of humanitarian aid including food and medical supplies for the northern part of the Gaza Strip, arrived from Jordan and entered Gaza today.

The entry of humanitarian aid through the Erez Crossing was made possible after engineering work was carried out in the area by the Engineering Units and additional IDF forces.
event_breakdown: The Erez Crossing opened for the entry of humanitarian aid into the Gaza Strip for the first time since the beginning of the war. 30 trucks of humanitarian aid, including food and medical supplies, arrived from Jordan and entered Gaza after security inspection. Engineering work was carried out in the area by Engineering Units and additional IDF forces to facilitate the entry of aid.

message:
Pro-Palestinian students yesterday took down the American flag at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and raised the Palestinian flag in its place.
County police officers arrived at the scene and re-raised the American flag. The pro-Israeli students stood there with Israeli flags and sang the American national anthem (as you can see in the attached video) in front of the American flag that was raised at the top of the mast.

Immediately after that, the pro-Palestinians tried to remove the American flag again, and then the students in the picture came and raised the American flag and prevented the flag from touching the floor.

##
The Americans are very sensitive to the issue of the flag and in my opinion the pro-Palestinians' injury to it plays against them in American public opinion. The pro-Israel American students made sure to show their respect for American symbols. There are many merits here for Israel and the Jewish community.
location: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
event_breakdown: Pro-Palestinian students take down American flag at University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, raise Palestinian flag. County police officers re-raise American flag, pro-Israeli students display Israeli flags and sing American national anthem. Pro-Palestinians attempt to remove American flag again, but students prevent it from touching the floor.

message:
Iran: The Fars district police use the Iranian military drone Mahajr 6 to enforce traffic laws....

The Iranian drivers hope that the UAV, which is capable of carrying bombs, is not armed...
event_breakdown: Iranian police in the Fars district utilize the Iranian military drone Mahajr 6 for traffic law enforcement. Iranian drivers express concern over the drone's potential for carrying bombs.
